entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -5.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
